member.name: T:System.IServiceProvider
member.summary: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service object; that is, an object that provides custom support to other objects.

member.name: M:System.IServiceProvider.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the service object of the specified type.
member.returns: A service object of type .-or- null if there is no service object of type .
member.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for a cancelable event.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the property set to false.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the property set to the given value.
member.param: true to cancel the event; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
member.returns: true if the event should be canceled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.IChangeTracking
member.summary: Defines the mechanism for querying the object for changes and resetting of the changed status.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IChangeTracking.AcceptChanges
member.summary: Resets the object’s state to unchanged by accepting the modifications.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IChangeTracking.IsChanged
member.returns: true if the object’s content has changed since the last call to ; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject
member.summary: Provides functionality to commit or rollback changes to an object that is used as a data source.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit
member.summary: Begins an edit on an object.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit
member.summary: Discards changes since the last call.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit
member.summary: Pushes changes since the last or call into the underlying object.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.IRevertibleChangeTracking
member.summary: Provides support for rolling back the changes

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IRevertibleChangeTracking.RejectChanges
member.summary: Resets the object’s state to unchanged by rejecting the modifications.
